# PHAssetResourceProgressHandler

**Type Alias**

The signature for a block that Photos calls while downloading asset resource data from iCloud. Used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceRequestOptions/progressHandler] property.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias PHAssetResourceProgressHandler = (Double) -> Void
```

## Discussion

If you request an asset resource whose data is not on the local device, and you have enabled downloading with the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceRequestOptions/isNetworkAccessAllowed] property, Photos calls your block periodically to report progress.

The block takes a single parameter:



## Fetching Resource Data from iCloud

- **isNetworkAccessAllowed**: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested asset resource data from iCloud.
- **progressHandler**: A block that Photos calls periodically while downloading the asset resource data.
